review: It would be good, if your TV came with additional HDMI slots and you can have one dedicated solely for it.  It sets up real fast but I am giving it one star less due to its lack of application.I am using a Samsung Note 2 and there's not many apps that can help project the photos in my phone easily.  Other than that, its easy to run Youtube.  There are other apps like Plex but I don't want to spend extra if I am only using it now and then.
